ai-tha-ap125:1.4_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha,
ai-tha-ap125:2.3_0: I am the one who wishes,
ai-tha-ap125:3.1_0: At a time when the Buddha tread,
ai-tha-ap125:3.2_0: world’s Elder, unskilled in the world,
ai-tha-ap125:5.3_0: out of compassion for living creatures,
ai-tha-ap125:6.4_0: for the Teacher is a great sage.
ai-tha-ap125:7.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap125:7.4_0: and the fruit of that is the fruit.
ai-tha-ap125:8.1_0: One eons of the cosmos contracted
ai-tha-ap125:9.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap125:10.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pāyāsi.
ai-tha-ap125:11.1_0: is a third sound of drums.
